casebody.data:
J. A. CHRIST, trading and doing business under the trade name of CHRIST BUILDING SUPPLY COMPANY v. LEWIS BISHOP, also known as LOUIS BISHOP, and his wife, MINNIE BISHOP. 25 So. (2nd) 498

January Term, 1946

March 22, 1946 Special Division B Rehearing denied April 18, 1946. M. A. Rosin, for appellant. Gordon Hays and W. D. Bell, for appellees. *207PER CURIAM:

Affirmed.

CHAPMAN, C. J., BROWN and SEBRING, JJ., and BARNS, Circuit Judge, concur.
